AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Village Child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] never knew [PAWN_possessive] parents. [PAWN_pronoun] was 'raised' by the tribe communally. This involved a lot of drugs and other questionable parenting decisions.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Lone Child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was abandoned by [PAWN_possessive] parents in the middle of nowhere. Contrary to what you might expect, this actually meant [PAWN_pronoun] had a better childhood than most wood beets.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Parented Child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of the rare wood beets whose parents actually cared enough to raise their children. Because of this [PAWN_pronoun] had a more functional family life than many, if still fairly bad.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Drug Addled
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has spent most of [PAWN_possessive] adult life doing various drugs. [PAWN_pronoun]'s not very smart, but most [PAWN_pronoun] has a certain charm.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Child-Eater
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] loves the taste of child. [PAWN_pronoun] has eaten a large number of them over the years, and is adept at catching and cooking them.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Pecan Shaman
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Pecan Shaman, one of the religious leaders whose job it is to determine the identity of the next Pecan Joe.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Valenwood Raider
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has participated in numerous raids on Valenroff holdings. Dozens have died by [PAWN_possessive] hand.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Lazy Villager
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]'s use of drugs has made them quite lazy.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Valenroff Slave
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was captured by Valenroffs and forced to work in their mines for years before escaping.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Meatball Near-Miss
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] encountered a slub in [PAWN_possessive] wanderings. [PAWN_pronoun] was nearly captured, but managed to slip away. [PAWN_pronoun] has been scarred by this event.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Valenwood Forager
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was tasked with gathering food for [PAWN_possessive] tribe. [PAWN_pronoun] turned out to be quite good at this.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Pecan Joe
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is the reincarnation of Pecan Joe, the leader of the wood beets and in many ways their god.
